about_the_game:
Welcome to Dream Home Designer VR, the ultimate virtual reality experience for home design enthusiasts! Developed by RomanTech LLC, this immersive game allows you to step into the shoes of a professional interior designer. With a wide variety of levels and hundreds of pieces of furniture, you can unleash your creativity and transform spaces to meet your clients' dreams and desires.

In Dream Home Designer VR, you’ll work on diverse projects ranging from cozy apartments to luxurious mansions. Each level presents unique challenges and opportunities, pushing you to think outside the box and showcase your design skills. Select from an extensive library of furniture, decor, and architectural elements to craft personalized and stunning interiors.

Features:

  • Immersive VR Experience: Dive into a fully realized virtual environment where you can interact with every element of your designs.
  • Variety of Levels: Take on multiple projects, each with its own distinct style and requirements.
  • Extensive Furniture Collection: Access hundreds of pieces of furniture and decor items to customize every detail of your designs.
  • Client Interaction: Meet the needs and preferences of your virtual clients to achieve the perfect balance of style and functionality.
  • Realistic Physics and Lighting: Experience lifelike physics and lighting effects that add depth and realism to your creations.
  • Share Your Designs: Capture and share your favorite designs with friends.

Whether you're a seasoned designer or a newcomer to the world of interior design, Dream Home Designer VR offers a rich and engaging experience that will keep you coming back for more. Let your imagination run wild and create the homes of your dreams!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 (Windows 7 may work but is not officially supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: Valve Index, HTC Vive, or Oculus Rift
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: Valve Index, HTC Vive, or Oculus Rift
